site.name: Furnish Your Rental
site.tagline: Your rental property can look like a model home without the price tag. Rent your unit faster by creating an elevated space that potential tenants and your budget will love.
site.description: Transform your rental properties into beautiful, tenant-ready spaces. Professional interior design and styling services that help you rent faster and at better rates. Free consultation available.

home.heroTagline: Your rental property can look like a model home without the price tag. Rent your unit faster by creating an elevated space that potential tenants and your budget will love.

aboutNicole.title: About Nicole Rothman
aboutNicole.description: Is your unrented unit causing anxiety? Who better to relieve your anxiety than a psychologist…but wait…you need an interior decorator.  Funny thing.  I'm a psychologist who fell in love with the process of transformation.  Typical psychologist!   Transforming unfurnished units into model homes became so much fun.  But the true magic was elevating the spaces without the outrageous price tags.  Nerdy psychologists enjoy research.  I personally research every item to ensure quality and price.  Overpaying is not an option.  "It only looks expensive."  Every unit I've decorated has rented faster and at a higher rate.  Imagine a modern, turnkey unit completed by someone else who is not you.  Furniture ordered, delivered, and accepted. All of the décor and essentials come from Amazon for convenience.  Your place ready to go without lifting a finger.  When your return on investment increases, you won't need money for therapy.  Decorating your unit will be a lot less expensive than getting psychological treatment.

rentalSection.title: Has your rental been sitting on the market?
rentalSection.description: Unfurnished or under-styled spaces make it harder to rent. Transform your rental property into a space that tenants will love and want to call home. Our professional styling services help you rent faster and at better rates.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive rental property styling solutions designed to help you rent faster and at better rates. From consultation to full furnishing, we've got you covered.

items.title: Free Consultation
items.description: Start with a complimentary consultation to discuss your rental property needs and how we can help transform your space. We'll assess your property, understand your goals, and provide personalized recommendations tailored to your budget and timeline.

items.title: Furnishing
items.description: Choose from our comprehensive furnishing options to suit your needs and budget:
options: Full furniture + Décor/Essentials - Complete transformation with all furniture, décor, and essential items
Partial furniture + Décor/Essentials - Select furniture pieces combined with décor and essentials
Décor Only - Beautiful styling with décor and accessories to enhance your existing space

items.title: Full Inventory of Pricing
items.description: Complete pricing information for all items from Amazon, making it easy to see costs upfront. We provide detailed pricing breakdowns so you know exactly what you're investing in. All items are sourced from Amazon for convenience and transparency.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Rental Property?
cta.description: Let's discuss how we can help you rent faster and at better rates.

work.title: Our Work
work.description: Explore our portfolio of stunning transformations. See how we've transformed rental properties into beautiful, tenant-ready spaces that rent faster and at better rates.
work.pricingNote: Decor only: 2 bedroom 2 bathroom 1300sq ft = $2500 minimum
work.additionalDescription: More beautiful spaces we've created for our clients

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to transform your rental property? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

footer.description: Transforming rental properties into beautiful, tenant-ready spaces that rent faster and at better rates.
